name: Effect: Codex of Destruction and Renewal

description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Codex of Destruction and Renewal]

The spell grants the target regeneration 20, restoring 20 Hit Points at the start of its turn and preventing the target both from dying due to damage and from its dying condition increasing to a value that would result in its death.
